comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This would be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Sutherland-Leveson-Gower,_5t... who succeeded to the title in 1913 and lived until 1963. In March 1914 he put 300,000 acres of a Scottish estate up for sale, needing cash for estate (inheritance) taxes. The year before, he had sold paintings (including old masters) at Christies. NYT of March 02, 1914, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A01E1DE163AE633A... indicates that he had returned recently from the United States on the Amerika.

comment._content: That's a nice professional portrait, beautifully lighted.
